abstract: Fox will add four sitcoms and three dramas to its schedule come fall, and it will move “Glee” to 8 p.m. to buttress a new Tuesday night of comedy.
snippet: Fox will add four sitcoms and three dramas to its schedule come fall, and it will move “Glee” to 8 p.m. to buttress a new Tuesday night of comedy.
lead_paragraph: Fox will add four sitcoms and three dramas to its schedule come fall, and it will move “Glee” to 8 p.m. to buttress a new Tuesday night of comedy.

headline.main: Upfronts: Fox’s Fall and Midseason Schedule
